title: Architectural Services
subject: We deliver innovative, sustainable architectural designs for diverse projects—from residential to industrial developments.
description:
Our interdisciplinary architectural team leverages experience across Africa and the Middle East to offer a full range of design and planning services.

We deliver creative and environmentally responsible solutions that are tailored to our client’s needs and objectives.

Services include feasibility studies, design development, development of construction drawings, permitting and approvals, interior design, sustainable design, historic preservation, site planning, and landscape architecture.

We also provide 3D modeling and visualization, urban design, and post-occupancy evaluation.

We offer architecture, interiors, workplace master planning and urban design.
additional: Includes architecture, interiors, workplace master planning, and urban design.

title: Quantity Surveying
subject: Optimizing returns on investment, our cost management strategy ensures project feasibility and confidence in outcomes
description:
Our cost management strategy is focused on helping our clients realize the best value from their investment.

We help to keep costs down, deliver quality, and ensure our clients get value for their money.

We offer quantity surveying services on all phases of projects, from pre-contract feasibility studies and cost planning to post-contract cost control and final account preparation.

title: Project Management
subject: We specialize in construction project management, ensuring success through tailored resources, effective team integration, and comprehensive project management services.
description:
We provide project management services that support our clients through all phases of project development, from concept to completion.

Our services include feasibility studies, site selection, team formation and coordination, design and planning, contractor selection and negotiation, construction supervision, cost and schedule management, quality control, and project close-out.

title: Program Management
subject: We excel in program management, ensuring efficiency without compromising quality, with expertise in cost, schedule, and quality management throughout projects.
description:
Our program management services are structured to support our clients in the successful delivery of complex programs.

We provide oversight and coordination to ensure that project goals are achieved efficiently and effectively.

Our expertise includes capital planning, program management organizations, project portfolio management, and program reviews and audits.

title: Construction Management
subject: Our comprehensive construction management services ensure successful outcomes, addressing everyday challenges while prioritizing safety, timelines, and budgets.
description:
We offer construction management services that provide clients with leadership, coordination, and direction through all phases of a construction project.

Our approach ensures that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and in compliance with quality standards.

Our services include constructability review, contract administration, construction scheduling, cost estimating, and change order management.

title: Project Controls
subject: Effective project controls ensure success by balancing oversight with project complexity, optimizing resources to achieve desired outcomes efficiently.
description:
Our project controls services help clients manage and monitor project performance throughout the lifecycle of a project.

We support cost estimating, schedule management, earned value management, and change order control, ensuring projects remain on target and stakeholders stay informed.

title: Construction Claims
subject: We resolve construction disputes with expert claims analysis and management, ensuring optimal outcomes through experience and hands-on support.
description:
Our construction claims services offer clients expertise in managing disputes, mitigating risks, and resolving issues through negotiation, arbitration, or litigation.

We provide claims analysis, alternate dispute resolution, and expert witness testimony.

title: Project Risk Management
subject: Our risk assessment experts enhance project success by identifying, analyzing, and mitigating potential delays and disruptions efficiently.
description:
We offer project risk management services that provide a structured approach to identifying and addressing potential risks.

Our team helps clients mitigate uncertainties that may affect project objectives.

Services include risk analysis and modeling, risk response planning, and training.

title: Environmental & Social Performance Services
subject: From due diligence to compliance monitoring, we offer comprehensive environmental and social management services
description:
We support investment projects with a wide range of environmental and social performance services.

We ensure compliance with environmental and social regulations and help clients manage risks associated with development activities.

Our services include due diligence assessments, safeguard compliance, ESG implementation, and development of ESMS and EMS.
details: ESMS and EMS (14001:2015) design and audits

title: Social Risk Management
subject: We provide support in land acquisition, resettlement planning, and livelihood restoration
description:
Our social risk management team assists clients in managing social risks associated with infrastructure and development projects.

We help with land acquisition and resettlement planning, livelihood restoration, and compliance with international standards.

title: Financial Advisory Services
subject: We evaluate project cost control, cost engineering and performance. Identifying areas of potential financial risk and proposing mitigation approach.
description:
Our financial advisory services provide comprehensive oversight and strategic insights that help clients identify and mitigate financial risks.

We support projects with cost control audits, budgeting, forecasting, and management control assessments.
details: Budget and cost forecast accuracy evaluation

title: Industrial & Mining
subject: We provide architectural, quantity surveying, and project management solutions for industrial and mining sectors, ensuring efficiency, compliance, and sustainability.
description:
We serve industrial and mining clients with integrated solutions across architecture, project management, and quantity surveying disciplines.

Our services are designed to ensure regulatory compliance, sustainability, and operational efficiency.
